      • areItemStacksEqualIgnoreTags

        public static boolean areItemStacksEqualIgnoreTags(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stackA,
                                                   net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stackB,
                                                   java.lang.String... nbtTagsToIgnore)
        Compares item, meta, size and nbt of two stacks while ignoring nbt tag keys provided. This is useful in shouldCauseReequipAnimation overrides.
        Parameters:
        stackA - first stack to compare
        stackB - second stack to compare
        nbtTagsToIgnore - tag keys to ignore when comparing the stacks
